modName: 83Willows - 1 EYE OPEN - creepy Nightmother and Coffins
summary:
Creepy HD Retextures for the Nightmother and her Coffin > V 2.5: NMM-Installer-file for easy Installation!

7 Nightmother Retextures + 12 Coffin Retextures (5 basic colors + lots of bloody variations)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1775/30147937568_6ed737ff8b_o.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=3][color=#ff0000]V2.5 >>>>> 12 NEW HD-COFFIN RETEXTURES
5 basic coffin colors with lots of (blood+gore) variations to choose from >>> 12 NEW HD COFFIN RETEXTURES! [/color]

[color=#cc0000](you don't need to use the official HD-texture Pack to enjoy my new HD Retextures!
But if you are using it then please read the info-section below - about how to make it compatible with my mod!)
Easy ALL-IN-ONE - NMM-Installer lets you choose you favourite Nightmother and Coffin Retexture (+preview images + descriptions)

[size=3]All NIGHTMOTHER files have also been improved and optimized to make them more performance-friendly!
So make sure to install the latest version 2.5 - your PC will thank you! :)[/size][/color]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7429/27225556336_2f6cb6e90b_o.jpg[/img]

7 NIGHTMOTHER Retextures:
[img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/8/7284/26652541454_1c330a2570_o.jpg[/img]




[img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/8/7661/27189738271_3e98634503_o.jpg[/img]
[color=#cc0000]The nightmother is a pretty scary thing - but I thought she didn't really look creepy and dark enough
- so I made this retextures of her and her coffin.

I added some details to her dress, put bloodsplatters on the floor of her coffin and totally recolored her hair, face and body.
The coffin itself is now sharper, a bit darker and less greenish.
I also reduced the red glow of certain areas - now only the important parts glow - and there are no/less overly bright spots on her.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
Use the NMM for easy download and installation! The NMM-Installer lets you choose your favourite Nightmother and Coffin HD Retexture (preview images and descriptions included!)
MANUAL INSTALLATION is still possible - download the file manually and ignore the fomod folder (preview images are inside!) - install you favorite Nightmother and Coffin files into this folder: Skyrim/Data/Textures/Clutter/Nightmother

To uninstall just delete my nightmother and coffin files.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Official HD DLC Pack Compatibility - Step by Step Guide
If you are using the official HD_Texture_Pack you have to follow this little guide to make it compatible with my HD-Retextures
(and most other Texture-Mods)! Dont worry - it is really simple and safe - just follow the 4 steps:

1. Go to your Skyrim.ini, usually located in Documents/My Games/Skyrim. Make a backup!
2. In the Skryim.ini find the section called [Archive], and add the information for the HiResTexturePack.bsa files so that it looks exactly like this:

[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

3. Save the .ini with the new settings
4. Disable/Delete HiResTexturePack01.esp and HiResTexturePack02.esp
You don't need them anymore to run the dlc-textures because of the above .ini changes.
[/color]
[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7213/27189738921_cf5129a02b_o.jpg[/img]
[color=#cc0000]>>> 21. Jan 2012 BIG UPDATE - V 2.0:
NMM-Installer-File + 4 new Nightmother Retextures + 3 new Coffin Retextures + updated Normal-Maps for my older files!!!

>>> 01. Jan 2012 V1.2: Two new Nightmother retextures: Skull + Skull_RedEyes (both with much whiter Body and darker dress) Coffin retexture: Bloody Handprint V2: darker Blood, slightly diffrent angle and position

>>> V1.1: two optional retextures for the inside of the coffin:

>>> 28. Dec. 2011: V1 - Release



You can find my other Mods here:[/color]
